main event: A sighting of two unidentified flying objects was reported in Williston, North Dakota on February 28, 1961.
interesting points: The objects were described as circular, roughly the size of a nickel, with white color and a red center,They exhibited erratic movement and were observed for over an hour,The sighting included observations made both visually and with a telescope,The report suggests possible explanations including astronomical bodies, balloons, or aircraft,One of the observers was City Patrolman Bill Lord, who reported the sighting to the local police department.
witness description: City Patrolman Bill Lord of Williston, ND
